00041 
00042 #ifndef OPENMESH_KERNEL_OSG_COLOR_CAST_HH
00043 #define OPENMESH_KERNEL_OSG_COLOR_CAST_HH
00044 
00045 #include <algorithm>
00046 #include <OpenMesh/Core/Utils/color_cast.hh>
00047 #include <OpenSG/OSGGeometry.h>
00048 
00049 namespace OpenMesh {
00050 
00053 template <>
00054 struct color_caster<osg::Color3ub,osg::Color3f>
00055 {
00056   typedef osg::Color3ub return_type;
00057   typedef unsigned char ub;
00058 
00059   inline static return_type cast(const osg::Color3f& _src)
00060   {
00061     return return_type( (ub)std::min((_src[0]* 255.0f + 0.5f),255.0f),
00062                         (ub)std::min((_src[1]* 255.0f + 0.5f),255.0f),
00063                         (ub)std::min((_src[2]* 255.0f + 0.5f),255.0f) );
00064   }
00065 };
00066 
00069 template <>
00070 struct color_caster<osg::Color3f,osg::Color3ub>
00071 {
00072   typedef osg::Color3f return_type;
00073 
00074   inline static return_type cast(const osg::Color3ub& _src)
00075   {
00076     return return_type( (float)(_src[0] / 255.0f ),
00077                         (float)(_src[1] / 255.0f ),
00078                         (float)(_src[2] / 255.0f ) );
00079   }
00080 };
00081 
00082 } // namespace OpenMesh
00083 
00084 #endif // OPENMESH_KERNEL_OSG_COLOR_CAST_HH
